Package com.deco2800.game.services

Class SoundService

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.services.SoundService
public class SoundService
extends java.lang.Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    boolean isLoaded  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SoundService​(java.lang.String initFile)
    SoundService handles the playing of sounds and music in the game.

  • Method Summary

  • Field Details

    • isLoaded

      public boolean isLoaded

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundService

      public SoundService​(java.lang.String initFile)
      SoundService handles the playing of sounds and music in the game. Please make a new initFile for each screen of the game, to save with memory issues.
      Parameters:
      initFile - The Sound file to load [initFile].ini

  • Method Details

    • loadAssets

      public void loadAssets()
      Loads all the assets from the ResourceService, so they can be called throughout the class.

      This must be called before any sounds can be played.

    • unloadAssets

      public void unloadAssets()
      Unloads all assets in the Sound Service. Because of the way the game manages Services, a Sound Service must be initialised for each screen of the game.

    • playSound

      public void playSound​(java.lang.String sound)
      Accepts a string that is used as index to the Hashtable of sounds Certain keywords have subroutines linked to them. Otherwise the "sound" parameter is used as a key to the table

      Parameters:
      sound - sound to play

    • playMusic

      public void playMusic​(java.lang.String music)
      Takes the key for the music track, mutes the previous one, and plays the new one. It only permits one track to be played at a time.
      Parameters:
      music - music to play

    • setGiantDistance

      public void setGiantDistance​(float distance)
      Function that remodels the previous Giant Sound effect manipulation in the CameraShakeComponent.

      If the giant is greater than 32f distance away, it's volume is determined by vol = sin(2pi*distance/120f)

      Parameters:
      distance - a float value represnting the giant's distance from the player

    • setMusicVolume

      public void setMusicVolume​(float volume)
      Sets the volume of the current music track.
      Parameters:
      volume - value between 0f - 1f for the music's volume.

    • setSfxVolume

      public void setSfxVolume​(float volume)
      Sets the volume of the sound effects. Special sounds may need their volume adjusted manually.
      Parameters:
      volume - value between 0f - 1f for the sfx volume.

    • setMusicLoop

      public void setMusicLoop​(boolean value)
      Sets the music to loop or to end after the track is over.
      Parameters:
      value - true if music will loop

    • update

      public void update()
      Called in MainGameScreen every tick. Updates the sound and in turn, may trigger sounds.
